response.job_title: DevOps Engineer | AWS Solutions Architect | 2x AWS Certified
response.summary: AWS DevOps engineer with experience in designing, implementing, and managing scalable cloud infrastructures. Skilled in automation, CI/CD pipelines, and containerization technologies. Strong expertise in AWS services, including EC2, S3, Lambda, ECS, CloudFormation, etc. Proven track record of optimizing development workflows and enhancing operational efficiency. Proficient in leveraging Terraform/Cloudformation to define, deploy, and update infrastructure resources in AWS, streamlining deployment processes and reducing manual errors. Collaborative team player with excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
response.skills: Terraform, AWS CDK, AWS CloudFormation, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Trabajo en equipo, Python, Programación, R, Strategic Planning, Estrategia empresarial, SQL, Database Development, Data Analysis, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Cloud Storage, AWS Lambda, Software Deployment, Cloud-Native Architecture, Cloud Development

profile_positions.description:
- DevOps support of different projects deployed in the AWS cloud applying infrastructure as code (Cloudformation, CDK toolkit, Terraform) to automate the process of creating the required infrastructure.
- Infrastructure deployment using CI/CD tools such as CodePipeline, CodeCommit, CodeBuild, and CodeDeploy.
- AWS Solution Architecture Pricing Estimates and well-architectated architectures design.
- Creation and deployment of environments based on AWS best practices.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Data cleansing projects through Salesforce platform and other tools so as to improve operative and sales processes in the company and generate higher incomes and better data quality.
- Automation processes using Slack, Microsoft Power Automate and other tools to improve team´s efficiency.
profile_positions.title: Associate Data Quality Analyst

profile_positions.description: Temporary data cleansing project to improve company data in salesforce.
profile_positions.title: Contractor

profile_positions.description:
- Clients’s prospection team support in Latin America by means of LinkedIn tools and Python programming.
- Hybrid Cloud Integration, Analytics and Security software demos design as a pre-sale support for sales team.
profile_positions.title: Hybrid Cloud Software & Solutions Intern

company.name: RevStar
company.description: RevStar develops modern, user-focused, cloud-native web and mobile applications. Leveraging the latest cloud technologies our solutions are built to scale. We help businesses get to market quickly through a tested agile process without sacrificing security, quality, or performance. RevStar brings an experienced team of full-stack developers, designers, solution architects, DevOps engineers, product managers, and quality assurance analysts to every software development project no matter the size.
